EmailTemplate.subject: There's still time to register! American Student Assistance Training Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join ASA this month! We are coming to Washington with our popular professional development workshop.
Washington Training Event
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a half-day training event for Washington. Now is the time to improve your skills at our training event. Join us to enhance core skills and stay ahead of evolving trends. 8/21/2007 Lacey, WA – Saint Martin’s University
Training Event: Let’s Talk Loans & So Much to Do – So Little Time
We are offering a half day workshop classes designed for all college administrators who are looking to improve their performance at work and add skills to their personal “tool box.”
Please join us for the morning session.
8:30am - 12:00pm Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided
Course Descriptions:
Let’s Talk Loans In this session we’ll go over some changes affecting loan certifications, answer any loan questions you may have, and finish off with case studies to hone your loan certification skills.
So Much To Do – So Little Time In this session we’ll examine some simple tricks to help you manage your tasks within the time that you have.
Who Should Attend
Any Financial Aid Professionals who wish to gain more knowledge about loans and would like more information about budgeting and managing their time more effectively.
How You Will Benefit Learn to understand when and how to take control of your time and gain a better understanding of student loans. How to register or for additional information, including driving directions
· Register Online at http://www.amsa.com/fap/training · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099
All American Student Assistance training events are offered free of charge
